mapper.select: select p.post_title, p.post_id, m.member_nickname, p.post_content, p.post_images from post p join member m on p.member_id = m.member_id order by post_id
select member_nickname, member_profile from member where member_grade= 4
select * from post p join member m on p.member_id = m.member_id WHERE m.member_id= #{memberId} ORDER BY p.post_views DESC
select b.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from post order by 1 desc) a where rownum <= #{page} * 10 ) b where b.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 10
